column1: Description: Total government spending, 2012 USD, net of general budget support ODA and disbursements on debt to the public sector
Units of measure: constant 2012 US$ millions
Source: Development Initiatives, based on IMF World Economic Outlook, OECD DAC, World Bank

Calculated from IMF WEO data on government spending as a proportion of GDP. Receipts of general budget support ODA and disbursements on public debt are subtracted from total government spending to avoid double counting when comparing with international resource flows.
On the 'Data-wide' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are only from the 'value' column.
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
It is provided on an as-is basis under an open-use license.
